isis.stitle: CAB: DAYCAB AND SLEEPER CAB for ProStar, ProStar Premium, and ProStar Limited Models - INSTALL - WINDSHIELD WASHER BOTTLE with PUMP MOTOR

svcproc.title: WINDSHIELD WASHER BOTTLE with PUMP MOTOR

svcsubproc.title: Install Windshield Washer Bottle with Pump Motor on Daycab and Sleeper Cab
svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 93
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: The washer bottle (Item 1) and pump motor (Item 2) are located on the passenger side frame rail (Item 11) just behind the bumper. Use the following steps to install washer bottle and pump motor.
To install the washer bottle (Item 1) with pump motor (Item 2) as a unit, follow the procedures below.

Position washer bottle with pump motor (Items 1 and 2) to the passenger side frame rail (Item 11). Install two hex head sems bolts (Item 9) and two hex flanged nuts (Item 10) to secure it. Tighten to 27 to 34 Lbf-ft (37 to 46 N•m).
Install windshield washer hose (Item 6) onto pump motor outlet port (Item 7).
Connect wiring harness connector (Item 3) to pump motor (Item 2).
Connect wiring harness connector (Item 4) to low fluid sensor (Item 5).
Install two Ty-wraps (Item 8) Securing wiring harness to washer bottle (Item 1).
Fill washer bottle (Item 1) with windshield washer solvent and check for leaks and washer operation.
Tilt hood to fully closed position and latch hood on both sides.
